title: 5 Common Facebook Ad Mistakes That Will Get You Fired
description: At Taktical, we reguarly audit the campaigns of both small startups and major corporations. We have routinely seen the same mistakes made by even the brightest of people. Things like poor messaging, bad data tracking, even targeting the wrong country! These mistakes cost money, and sometimes your job! This talk will help attendees figure out where they might be making mistakes, and how to fix them fast.
